column1: Since HilD activates the transcription of hilA ( 14), which in turn can activate HilA - dependent invFA expression ( 10), and directly activates HilC / D - dependent invFD expression ( 16), these results establish that the mlc mutation exerts a negative effect on SPI1 gene expression, mainly by increasing the level of hilE expression.

Transcriptional fusions to lacZ of the sseA, ssaB, ssaG, sseL, sifA and srfN promoters ( mapped previously; [ 9, 24] were integrated into the chromosome of wild type and DeltarpoE cells and then grown in the SsrB - activating medium LPM.
